title: Feature Pre-Planning Questions
description: Essential questions to answer before implementing a new feature

questions.question: What specific feature are you planning to implement?
questions.guidance: Provide a clear, concise description of the feature
examples: Add bulk contact import from CSV files

questions.question: What is the user story for this feature?
questions.guidance: Use format: As a [user type], I want [functionality] so that [benefit]
examples: As a sales manager, I want to import contacts from CSV so that I can quickly add leads from trade shows
As a support agent, I want real-time notifications so that I can respond to customers immediately

questions.question: What are the acceptance criteria for this feature?
questions.guidance: List specific, testable conditions that must be met
examples: Validate email format and phone numbers

questions.question: Describe the user workflow for this feature
questions.guidance: Step-by-step description of how users will interact with the feature
examples: 1. User clicks 'Import Contacts' button 2. Selects CSV file 3. Maps columns to fields 4. Reviews preview 5. Confirms import 6. Views results

questions.question: What is your planned technical approach?
questions.guidance: High-level description of how you'll implement this feature
examples: Use file upload component, parse CSV with Papa Parse library, validate data server-side, batch insert to database
Implement WebSocket connection, create notification service, update UI with real-time events

questions.question: Which existing components or modules will be affected?
questions.guidance: List components that need modification or new components to create

questions.question: What data model changes are needed?
questions.guidance: New tables, fields, or schema modifications
examples: Add import_batch_id field to contacts table
Add indexes for bulk search performance

questions.question: What edge cases or error scenarios should be handled?
questions.guidance: Consider failure modes and unusual inputs
examples: Invalid CSV format or empty file

questions.question: How will you test this feature?
questions.guidance: Describe unit tests, integration tests, and user testing approach
examples: Unit tests for CSV parsing and validation, integration tests for full import workflow, manual testing with various CSV formats

questions.question: What is your rollback plan if issues arise?
questions.guidance: How to safely disable or revert the feature
examples: Feature flag to disable import functionality, database rollback script for imports, clear error messaging to users
